#summary 信息管理.

= 信息管理 =
<p>
	 </p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; text-indent: -18pt;">
	<br />
	1. 快速添加</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	从左侧管理菜单点击快速添加进入。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085629_pJte_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085710_0SsQ_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 38.955pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; text-indent: 10.5pt;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085726_M0xS_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085739_EliD_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	输入相关属性后添加"保存"按钮即可。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; text-indent: -18pt;">
	2. 添加信息</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	从左侧管理菜单点击信息管理进入信息管理页面。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085803_O1hF_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	进入指定栏目，点击"添加"按钮</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085815_OrBt_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085829_ykIG_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 38.955pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; text-indent: 10.5pt;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085840_Pb99_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085851_L0Q8_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	输入相关属性后添加"保存"按钮即可。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	提示：使用此处的添加信息，栏目会默认设置为当前栏目。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; text-indent: -18pt;">
	3. 编辑信息</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	进入指定栏目，选择需要编辑的信息，点击"编辑"按钮。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	注意：同时只能对一条信息进行编辑操作。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085905_Ig5U_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085917_6O8X_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085931_MScc_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 38.955pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; text-indent: 10.5pt;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085944_9vpf_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085957_77IK_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	输入相关属性后添加"保存"按钮即可。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; text-indent: -18pt;">
	4. 删除信息</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	进入指定栏目，选择需要删除的信息，点击"删除"按钮。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	提示：同时可以选择多条信息进行删除操作。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/090009_sTdb_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/090027_Gg45_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	 </p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	为防止用户误操作，系统会提示用户确认，点击"确定"按钮即可。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; text-indent: -18pt;">
	5. 签收统计</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	从FreeCMS 1.2 开始支持。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	在信息列表中可以查看那些是签收信息。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/090040_bg0d_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	点击"是"链接查看签收统计结果，可以查看需要签收的用户，用户是否已经过此信息及签收时间和IP。</p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px;">
	<img alt="" data-ke-="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/090051_Fu31_916014.png" style="border: 0px;" /></p>
<p style="word-wrap: break-word; margin: 0px 0px 15pt 39pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; text-indent: -18pt;">
	6. 信息属性说明</p>
